data.name: Depth Hunter 2: Scuba Kids - Hidden Treasures
data.detailed_description: Dive to the bottom of the sea and find various hidden items in this hidden-object game. 20+ sea creatures, 10 locations, 3 game modes, special items and amazing 3D graphics. Easy and funny game for kids!
data.about_the_game: Dive to the bottom of the sea and find various hidden items in this hidden-object game. 20+ sea creatures, 10 locations, 3 game modes, special items and amazing 3D graphics. Easy and funny game for kids!
data.short_description: Dive to the bottom of the sea and find various hidden items in this hidden-object game. 20+ sea creatures, 10 locations, 3 game modes, special items and amazing 3D graphics. Easy and funny game for kids!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Russian*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.2 GHz or AMD Athlon X2 2.7 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce 8800. ATI equivalent. Intel Integrated Graphics HD3000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 920 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or 8
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce 8800 or higher. ATI equivalent. Intel Integrated Graphics HD4000+
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 920 MB available space
